thread.title: "Girls Next Door" star Bridget Marquardt is engaged
thread.title_full: "Girls Next Door" star Bridget Marquardt is engaged - CBS News

author: Andrea Park CBS News
title: "Girls Next Door" star Bridget Marquardt is engaged
text:
Holly Madison and Kendra Wilkinson might be feuding, but the third blonde from "The Girls Next Door" is staying out of the drama and making wedding plans.
Bridget Marquardt is engaged to her long-time beau, Nick Carpenter, and she has a very interesting ring on her finger to show for it.
Perhaps in the spirit of October and Halloween, Carpenter gifted Marquardt with a spider-shaped engagement ring. The reality star wrote on Instagram: "Happy Oct. 1st!!! Oh...and... Did I mention @nicholascarpenter and I are engaged?" followed by Halloween-themed emojis.
Marquardt started dating her director boyfriend in 2008; the two met at the Playboy Mansion, where she used to live with ex Hugh Hefner.
